code: import cities from"../../database/cityData";import{getPerson,getPeople}from"../../database/peopleData";import{capitalizeFirstLetter}from"../../utils";var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isMale=Math.floor(Math.random()*2)===0;var isPlural=Math.floor(Math.random()*2)===0;var isAffirmative=Math.floor(Math.random()*2)===0;var subject;if(isPlural)subject=getPeople();else subject=getPerson(isMale);var city=cities[Math.floor(Math.random()*cities.length)];var prompt=capitalizeFirstLetter("".concat(isPlural?"are":"is"," ").concat(subject.firstName," from ").concat(city,"? ").concat(isAffirmative?'(Affirmative)':'(Negative)'));var answer="".concat(isAffirmative?"Yes":"No",", ").concat(subject.subjectivePronoun," ").concat(isPlural?'are':'is').concat(isAffirmative?'':"n't",".");return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
